info.name: Protogen Face
info.description:
Tried to make a protogen face, similar to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpbvKUYoOUQ
Animation created in piskelapp.com, exported as an array (`frames`) and then packed more tightly into a bitmask. Bloom is commented out due to tmp array to large error

renderpass.code:

vec4 textureFrame(uint frame, vec2 uv) {
  vec2 cuv = vec2(uv.x, 1.0-uv.y);
  
  uvec2 size = uvec2(128,75);
  uvec2 pos = uvec2(cuv * vec2(size));
  uint element = pos.x + pos.y * size.x;
  uint bitOffset = element % 32u;
  uint uvec4Offset = element / 32u % 4u;
  uint innerFrameOffset = element / 128u;
  uint frameOffset = frame * 75u; //Each frame is 75 uvec4s;
  uint pixel = frames[frameOffset + innerFrameOffset][uvec4Offset] & (1u << bitOffset);
  float pv = clamp(float(pixel), 0.0, 1.0);
  return vec4(pv, pv, pv, pv);
}

float luminance(vec4 c) {
  return (0.2126*c.r + 0.7152*c.g + 0.0722*c.b) * c.a;
}
float rand(float s){
    return fract(sin(s * 12.9898 ) * 43758.5453);
}

vec4 render(vec2 uv, vec2 res) {
    vec4 c = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
    // Pixelated grid of circle shapes
    vec2 count = vec2(128.0 / 2.0, 75.0 / 2.0);
    vec2 uvPixel = ceil(uv * count) / count;
    vec2 uvInsidePixel = mod(uv * count, 1.0);
    float circlePixel = distance(uvInsidePixel, vec2(0.5, 0.5));
    
    // Input
    //vec4 inp = texture(iChannel0, uvPixel);
    uint frame = uint(iTime * 13.0) % 13u;
    uint frame2 = uint(iTime * 13.0 + 1.0) % 13u;
    uint frame3 = uint(iTime * 13.0 + 2.0) % 13u;
    vec4 inp = textureFrame(frame, uvPixel);
    vec4 inp2 = textureFrame(frame2, uvPixel);
    vec4 inp3 = textureFrame(frame3, uvPixel);
    float lum /*[0,1]*/ = (inp.r + inp2.r + inp3.r) / 3.0;
    //if (lum < 0.0001) {
    //    return c;
    //}
    
    // Circle
    float offset = uvPixel.y + uvPixel.x * count.x;
    float noise = rand(offset);
    float shimmerPhase = noise * 6.28;
    float shimmerTheta = iTime * 6.28 * noise * 40.0;
    float shimmer = sin(shimmerTheta + shimmerPhase) * noise * 0.2;
    float v /*[0,1]*/ = clamp(lum + (1.0 - lum) * shimmer, 0.0, 1.0);
    
    float radius = mix(0.0, 0.25, v);
    c = circlePixel <= radius
        ? PHOSPHOR_COL * lum
        : vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
    return c;
}


void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    vec2 uv = fragCoord.xy / iResolution.xy;
    vec4 c = vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
    
    // The Input
    c = render(uv, iResolution.xy);
    
    //uint frame = uint(iTime * 13.0) % 13u;
    //c = textureFrame(frame, uv);
    
    // Simple Bloom
    /*float B = float(MAIN_BLOOM_ITERATIONS*MAIN_BLOOM_ITERATIONS);
    for(int i=0; i<MAIN_BLOOM_ITERATIONS; i++)
    {
      float dx = float(i-MAIN_BLOOM_ITERATIONS/2)*MAIN_BLOOM_SIZE;
      for(int j=0; j<MAIN_BLOOM_ITERATIONS; j++)
      {
        float dy = float(j-MAIN_BLOOM_ITERATIONS/2)*MAIN_BLOOM_SIZE;
        c += render(uv + vec2(dx, dy), iResolution.xy)/B;
      }
    }*/
    
    
    fragColor = c;
}
